sentence: For example, former Georgia Senator David Perdue, whom Trump recruited to challenge Republican Governor Brian Kemp, is lagging in the polls and fundraising despite Trump's backing and an in-state rally by the former president.
author: Mark Niquette
title: Trump Backs Hillbilly Elegy' Author Vance in Ohio Primary
